Hotel Margaret

Hotel Margaret appears to be an elegant hotel on the shores of lake Balaton, with its own yacht port, private bay, gourmet kitchen, and with countless entertainment opportunities. However, in this series nothing is as it seems. In the summer of 2021 Hotel Margaret hosts the gala for the most successful video content creator influencer with the most followers. The event goes sideways when the winner gets murdered upon taking over the prize. The police place the hotel under lockdown immediately, and the mysterious killer, with all certainty, is compelled to enjoy the hospitality of the hotel for a little longer.

Everyone is suspicious, and everyone tries to make others seem more suspicious. The investigation led by Captain Tordai takes turns and holds new surprises for the viewers every night in this black humor enriched comedy-thriller series set by the lake Balaton. Made on behalf of RTL Hungary.
